description:
With a minimalist design that frees you to travel fast and light, the versatile Norvan Short is a go-to for trail runs, hikes, and high-output adventure. The Diem™ fabric, a light, breathable, 100%-recycled stretch polyester, dries fast and feels comfortable. Two back pockets – one zippered – hold map, gels, and smartphone, an FC0 DWR (durable water repellent) treatment helps prevent moisture absorption, and the elastic waist adjusts with a drawcord for a secure fit.

Updated with a revised fit.

Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
name: Arcteryx Norvan Shorts, 9" Inseam - Mens

specs.key: Contains materials that meet the bluesign® criteria, Self fabric uses PFC-free DWR
specs.value: PFCs are a class of chemicals used to provide highly effective water repellency to textiles, but are known to persist in the environment., Contains recycled polyester
